javadoc: Handles general storage and retrieval of short values indexed by long keys.

methods.javadoc:
Constructor for ShortPropertySet.
@param name the name associated with this property set.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: name
params.comment: the name associated with this property set.

methods.name: putShort
methods.comment:
Stores a short value at the given index.  Any value currently at that
 index will be replaced by the new value.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index at which to store the short value.

methods.name: getShort
methods.comment: Retrieves the short value stored at the given index.

params.name: index
params.comment: the index at which to retrieve the short value.

throws.comment: if there is no short value stored at the index.

return.comment: the value stored at the given index.

methods.javadoc: saves the property at the given index to the given output stream.
methods.name: saveProperty
methods.comment: saves the property at the given index to the given output stream.

methods.javadoc: restores the property from the input stream to the given index.
methods.name: restoreProperty
methods.comment: restores the property from the input stream to the given index.

name: ShortPropertySet
comment: Handles general storage and retrieval of short values indexed by long keys.
